name: Koreykam.GitHub.io
body:
### Korey Kam
### Welcome to my homepage.
My name is Korey Kam. I am a PhD student in the Department of Neuroscience at NYU (lab of Helen Scharfman). My interests lie in Alzheimer's disease, brain signals, and statistical graphics.
